name: Summer Daze: Tilly's Tale
description:
Summer Daze: Tilly's Tale is a fantasy visual novel adventure game designed by renowned game designer Lori Ann Cole, known for her work on Quest for Glory, Hero-U, Shannara, and Mixed-Up Fairy Tales. Set in the captivating world of Hero-U: Rogue to Redemption, the game follows the mischievous student Tilly Appleberry, who values people over rules. As Tilly, you'll use your wit, charm, and skills to make the upcoming Harvest Festival a success.

Summer Daze: Tilly's Tale combines the best elements of visual novels and adventure games, offering players multiple paths and control over Tilly's actions as she navigates her challenging semester as a rogue at Hero-University. Featuring an amazing voice cast, with Zehra Fazal (Voltron: Legendary Defender; Young Justice: Outsiders) bringing Tilly to life, the game boasts an original soundtrack by Brandon Blume (Mage's Initiation: Reign of the Elements), and fantastic artwork by JP Selwood and Al Eufrasio.

In Tilly's Tale, you'll embark on a thrilling adventure filled with action, intrigue, and unforgettable characters. With its engaging storyline, immersive gameplay, and stunning visuals and audio, this is a game you won't want to miss. Get ready to experience the ultimate fantasy adventure and help Tilly achieve her dreams at Hero University.
